name: European Forum for Agricultural and Rural Advisory Services
goal: Improving quality, effectiveness and efficiency  of agricultural and rural advisors’ work aimed at supporting farming families, farmers local groups agricultural organisations and individuals involved in agricultural and rural development and addressing of the current and emerging problems (economic, environmental and social).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Education, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Agriculture, Rural Development, CAP, Education and training, Sustainable development, Research and Innovation.
